text: topping off is an ancient tradition of
blessing and protection it is fitting to
pay tribute to the namesake of the child
center wrote milan qu chao to the
extraordinary life and legacy of my
mother whose love of education and off
service would be memorialized with and
within the child center but the sign
theme becomes the ongoing manifestation
of this physical work and a permanent
part of this new building i want to
thank the hundreds of workers for making
the child center a reality how things
work can sometimes be hard to grasp
construction remains wonderfully tactile
getting here in one year entailed moving
19,000 tons of material setting 190
piles pouring over 5,000 cubic yards of
concrete and welding 521 tons of steel
when it is finished the chao center will
symbolize this bridging of family and
bridging of cultures in the hope that
others will be inspired to develop
future leaders to build a better world
